verses.verse: But him that is <S%G770>weak<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4355>receive<s%> <S%G3361>ye<s%>, yet not <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1253>decision<s%> of <S%G1261>scruples<s%>.

Let <S%G987><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> be evil spoken <S%G987>of<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1035>eating<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4213>drinking<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G1398>that<s%> herein1722, 5125 <S%G1398>serveth<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2101>well-pleasing<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.
